person.content:

Paragraph: The students , who had staged an 11-hour protest at the junction in northern Rangoon , were taken away in three vehicles .

2. protesters (referring to the students who staged the protest)

So, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are "students" and "protesters".

Sure, my apologies. The "Person" entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to people are:

So, the only "Person" entity in the paragraph is "students".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the "Person" entities in the paragraph:

| students |

The only "Person" entity in the paragraph is "students".
